definitions.definition: at the time you are speaking or writing; now

examples.text: The crime is presently being investigated by the police.
These are the courses presently available.

definitions.definition: used to show that something happened after a short time

examples.text: Presently, the door opened again and three men stepped out.

definitions.definition: used to show that something will happen soon
definitions.labels: British EnglishNorth American EnglishNorth American EnglishBritish English
